mapper.select: select transaction_id 'transactionid' from crm.BALANCE_OPERATE a where a.ID = 1
select a.id 'id' a.order_id 'orderId', a.operate_type 'operateType', a.customer_id 'customerId', a.PLATFORM_FEE 'platformFee' from crm.BALANCE_LOG a where a.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE crm.BALANCE_LOG SET TRANSACTION_ID = #{transactionId}, RECEIVE_ADDRESS = #{receiveAddress}, RECEIVE_AMOUNT = #{receiveAmount}, CHANGE_ADDRESS = #{changeAddress}, SEND_ADDRESS = #{sendAddress}, FEE = #{fee}, CONFIRMATIONS = #{confirmations}, TRADE_STATUS = #{tradeStatus}, PLATFORM_FEE = #{platformFee} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
